# GEO & SEO - Knowledge Base

## SEO (Search Engine Optimization)

### Kerneprincipper
- **On-page SEO**: Titler, meta descriptions, headings (H1-H6), URL-struktur, intern linking, alt-tags pÃ¥ billeder
- **Off-page SEO**: Backlinks, brand mentions, social signals
- **Technical SEO**: Site speed, mobile-friendliness, crawlability, structured data (Schema.org), XML sitemaps, Core Web Vitals
- **Content SEO**: Keyword research, sÃ¸geintention, E-E-A-T (Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness), fresh content
